name: Joshua Wertheim
tagline: About me. What I do. My interests. Other fun tidbits.
body:
### Hello, Cyberworld!

Feel free to take a look around. I'm going to update this site as often as I can. Basically I plan to list current projects, display what may constitute useful Gists, and other interesting things. It is quite possible I may even blog through here about technology or development-related topics. Stay tuned!
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
